attributes.action: Close the physical Russian embassy and suspend their website: rusemb.org.uk
attributes.additional_details: Given that the Russian government is currently carrying out hostile actions against Ukraine and publishing inaccurate facts on their website, we petition the UK government to close the embassy in London and suspend rusemb.org.uk until the cessation of hostilities in Ukraine and reparations have been made.
attributes.background:
We petition the government to close the Russian embassy and other consulate services in the UK.

Furthermore, we petition for the suspension of rusemb.org.uk (their UK website) for publishing inaccurate information such as lies about Ukraine hospital bombings.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610043
